title: Powder Monkey Esports Looking For Players
body:
Hey Guys,

We are looking for players from all ranks to form some teams for competitions such as Summoners Ladder. We are a social Esports club so that doesn't mean you have to be the best player in the world you can be there for fun.

 we are looking to form multiple teams according to your skill levels, so if you are looking to take it serious and are a higher rank you will also fit in here just fine!

We would love for you to join us so all you need to do is fill out that application form and we will get back to you!

If you have any question feel free to ask here or add me on League.
